text: What's the purpose of `{% block header %}` in this example from the boilerplate:
I get the idea of using `extends` with the block body element
is it the same idea for header?

the use case is if you use a global header, but on a specific template you want to add a phone number to the header, you can now add that from within the template file to extend the header without having to make a bunch of variations of the header file.
